Package vowpalWabbit.learner

Interface VWLearner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    VWTypedLearner<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VWActionPDFValueLearner, VWActionProbsLearner, VWActionScoresLearner, VWActiveMulticlassLearner, VWCCBLearner, VWMulticlassLearner, VWMultilabelsLearner, VWNoPredLearner, VWPDFLearner, VWProbLearner, VWScalarLearner, VWScalarsLearner
    public interface VWLearner
extends Closeable
    This is the super type of all different typed VW learners. This type exists to ensure that the VWLearners.create(String) method has a super type.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
    throws IOException
        This will close the underlying VW model after performing any Close should be written in terms of closeAsync, followed by blocking for the result.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:

        Throws:
        IOException

      • closer

        Callable<Boolean> closer()

        Closing the underlying VW model may take a long time (for instance if it is to make multiple passes). To address this, this method provides a strategy for closing the model asynchronously by executing the returned Callable.

        It can be called synchronously or, if desired, can be passed to an ExecutorService to be executed asynchronously, or even to a Guava ListeningExecutorService to produce a ListenableFuture to which callbacks can be attached.

        NOTE: no locking should be necessary to produce the closer, but locking may be required when the closer's call method is invoked.

        NOTE: If the Callable is interrupted once started, there's a good chance that both the underlying VW model could corrupted and it may not be closable in the future (which could result in a memory leak).

        Returns:
        a Callable responsible for closing the model. The Callable should return true if model was open and an attempt is made to close the model. A return value of false indicates an attempt to close the model was made previously. This is consistent with other languages where a true return value indicates success.

      • saveModel

        void saveModel​(File filename)

      • isMultiline

        boolean isMultiline()
        Returns:
        true if the underlying VW learner requires multiline examples.

      • runDriver

        void runDriver()
        Run the VW driver, which starts the parser and processes all passes. Use this for multi-pass learning where the data file is specified via -d. The parser handles reading the data file, caching, and all passes automatically.
